snippet: New York City’s bike-share program, which was supposed to begin by the end of July, will not start until August.
abstract: Start of Citi Bike program, New York City’s bike-share effort, will be delayed until August; program, which is expected to ultimately include 10,000 bicycles, will allow members who pay an annual fee of $95 to shuttle between program stations for up to 45 minutes without an additional charge.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s bike-share program, which was supposed to begin by the end of July, will not start until August.

headline.main: Bike-Sharing, Promised for Late July, Is Delayed
headline.print_headline: Bike-Sharing, Promised for Late July, Is Delayed
